author: Stoweflake Resort & Conference Center
title: Stoweflake Introduces Signature Wellness Program for Corpor
text:
STOWE, Vt ., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Already an unparalleled meeting destination, the Stoweflake Resort & Conference Center, in the heart of Stowe, Vermont , raises the bar yet higher with the introduction of a new signature Wellness Program designed to make events more rewarding for attendees. A perennial favorite with meeting planners, Stoweflake has won the prestigious Pinnacle Award for the last consecutive 19 years and is the only facility in the state certified by the International Association of Conference Centers. "Our highly acclaimed, world-class Spa and Wellness Center is unique within New England and a destination unto itself," said Scot Baraw , Vice President of Sales at Stoweflake. "It allows us to put unmatched resources for promoting health and wellbeing at meeting planners' fingertips to enhance corporate events, taking them to the next level."
The new Wellness Program leverages the expertise of the Spa and Wellness Center's certified professionals and comprehensive facilities, as well as the AAA four diamond property's experienced culinary staff. Corporate events and meetings may be infused with planned group wellness activities and workshops, pre-paid Spa access, and nutritious menu options.
Among the group wellness activities offered are Yoga for all experience levels, Guided Meditation and Breathing Practice and Chair Massage Breaks.  Group wellness workshops are centered on Ayurveda Daily Routines, the ancient Indian science of life and wellness, and include such options as Sleep Tips, Relaxation / Stress Management, and Herbal Remedies to combat common ailments. 
Wellness Program options are designed to help meeting attendees recalibrate, revitalize and learn to become more present in the moment.  As a result, creativity flows and meetings become more productive, according to Baraw.
New England's premiere destination for meetings and corporate events, Stoweflake Resort & Conference Center is home to over 22,000 square feet of function space and is designed to meet the highest standards for gatherings large and small. Stoweflake features 15 thoughtfully designed year round venues where no detail is overlooked, from the latest in technology to ergonomic chairs and natural light.
Sought after settings include the Pinnacle Ballroom for up to 400 guests, the Atrium for mid-sized events, and the Executive Board Room for intimate gatherings.  In season, the lushly landscaped Courtyard beckons for alfresco and tented events. 
For more information please call 800-253-2232, or visit online at http://www.meetingsatstoweflake.com/ .
